reviewText: As a fan of mr. washington, I'm trying to obtain movies in which he's in. This collection I purchased, although seen before, was enjoyed and will be in the future. I was satisfied with the purchase and the seller. The product came in good shape as described.

Mr. Denzel Washington gives us his best- he is beyond excellence in his profession. Everytime the man applies his skills he is just amazing, how can a man be so perfect and make it look so natural and introduce you, the viewer into a new world, everytime. He is in my opinion one of the greatest actors who ever applied the art.

This collection of Denzel's movies is great. The four films: Inside Man, the Hurricane, The Bone Collector and Mo' Better Blues are a varied collection of Mr. Washington's film career. My favorite, Mo' Better Blues, showed a younger Denzel, working with Spike Lee again. That combination has made some interesting films. Spike Lee also directed Inside Man. Although Denzel doesn't seem to age much in these films of different decades; he does have a chameleon like presence in his portrayal of these contrasting characters.
If you appreciate the acting skills of Denzel Washington and or if you simply enjoy being told interesting and remarkable stories, this collection is an admirable addition to anyone's film collection.
i was so impressed with shipping packaging and the quality of the dvd viewing. excellence is my review. thank you very much (would recommend you highly. martha

We thoroughly enjoyed 3 of the 4 movies in this collection.  We didn't care for  Mo Better Blues, as we don't care for the type of jazz the movie featured, however, if someone enjoys it, I'm sure they will love Denzel in it.
I'm acquiring most if not all of Denzels' movies, this is a great addition to my collection and it plays well.
I really enjoy this actor but wasn't feeling the blues movie.  Just ran so slow and I felt bored.  But don't pass on this set if you get to buy it.  Other movies are very entertaining.
I love movies that Denzel Washington is in. This collection is great and I love all four movies that came with this collection. I recommend this collection for anyone who loves Denzel Washington.
COME ON,IT IS DENZEL WHAT ELSE CAN BE SAID?YOU HAVE TO LOVE HIS LIST OF MOVIES.IN  DENZEL AND DE NIRO YOU HAVE THE TWO BEST LEADING MEN IN THE LAST 20 YEARS
4 movies in slipcase that showcase and displays the acting chops of Denzel.  A tiny overview to the brilliance and talent of this American actor.
As with all his movies this one is good and I am happy with the quaility. I would order it again.
If you love Denzel, this is a great addition to any movie collection!!!!!!!!  All the great movie entertainment you could stand!
this guy is outstanding to say the least. Favorite actor , would be cool to meet him. His acting skills are second to none.

I encourage people who  enjoy Denzel Washington the actor..This particular disk has 4 of his movies on it. Actually was looking to make purchase for the movie The Hurricane and I came across this collection. A great deal for 4 movies and new under 9 dollars! I highly recommend this seller. Quick and New!
Met all the requirements for a great movie night!
Had to return, the picture was good.  Sunny
My husband and sons liked this set very much.
Denzel scoring everytime, no other actor does it best
Good popcorn movies
Great set of movies. I really like Denzel as an actor.
I bought this as a gift for my mother who is a huge fan, she loved it! The movies where great (ofc its denzel) and the packaging of the dvd's was good too.
This is a great collection of denzel's catalog and all cd's were in tact.
IT'S DENZEL!!!
